mapper.insert: insert into users (name, surname, password, email, status, course, faculty, gruppa) values( #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{surname, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{course, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{faculty, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{gruppa, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN} )
mapper.update: update users set name = #{name}, surname = #{surname}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, status = #{status}, course = #{course}, faculty = #{faculty}, gruppa = #{gruppa} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from users where status like #{status}
select id from users where email = #{email}
select id from users where email = #{email} and id <> #{id}
